scripts.start:postgres: export DBMS=postgres; docker-compose --env-file ./.env -f ./docker/docker-compose-postgres.yml up -d; npx prisma db push --force-reset --accept-data-loss; npm run dev
scripts.start:postgres2: export DBMS=postgres; docker-compose --env-file ./.env -f ./docker/docker-compose-postgres.yml up -d; npx prisma db push; npm run dev
